name: 芮祥鵬
objective:
高分子流變學
本課程以講述高分子流體之黏性及彈性為主。內容包括:
(1) 黏彈性簡介(2)時間溫度轉換(3)非結晶區之玻璃轉移點(4)橡膠理論
(5)黏彈模型(6)介電鬆弛等專題。
schedule:
1. Organic Material Intro. (1 週)

2. Polymer Intro.(2 週)

3. Fluid and Rheology Intro.(3 週)

4. Math Review (4 週)

5. Fluid Mechanics Review (I) (5 週)

6. Fluid Mechanics Review (II)(6 週)

7. Viscosity Measurement(7 週)

8. Viscoelasticity (8 週)

9. Viscoelasticity Modelling and Application (9 週)

10.Rheology Review(10 週)

11. Midtrerm Exam.(11 週)

12. Suspension Rheology(12 週)

13. Coating Rheology(13 週)

14. Fracture Mechanics(14 週)

15. Rubber Elasticity(15 週)

16. Time-Temperature Superposition(16 週)

17. Polymer Processing Intro.(17 週)

18. Final Exam. (18 週)
scorePolicy:
1. Midterm Exam. 30%
2. Final Exam. 40%
3. Term Paper with Presentation 30%
materials:
1. Rheology Principles, Measurements, and Applications
C.W. Macosko, VCH publisher
2. The Structure and Rheology of Complex Fluids
R.G. Larson,  Oxford University Press
